author: donaldp
msg: Integrate Checkstyle into our build process.
To get checkstyle running locally you need to download the checkstyle product, set the checkstyle.jar property to point to the checkstyle-all jar and set do.checkstyle=true
ie Place something similar to the following into your jakarta0avalon-excalibur/ant.properties
